snippet: Only four percent of Syrians believe Islamic State insurgents, who have captured large swathes of Syria and Iraq, represent their interests, according to research conducted by a British polling group published on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Islamic State Appeals to Only Four Percent of Syrians: Poll
headline.main: Islamic State Appeals to Only Four Percent of Syrians: Poll

lead_paragraph: Only four percent of Syrians believe Islamic State insurgents, who have captured large swathes of Syria and Iraq, represent their interests, according to research conducted by a British polling group published on Wednesday.
